summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the Butterfly Trust for the period of July 1, 2016, to July 31, 2016. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned, as well as instructions for addressing errors in transactions.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust had an ending balance of $2.98 as of July 31, 2016.
The account experienced service charges totaling $50.00 during the statement period.
Interest earned during this period was $50.00.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
No overdraft fees were incurred during this statement period.
